item.title: By: Bishnubrata Patra
item.dc:creator: Bishnubrata Patra
item.description: It is really surprising to read this article! On the one hand, Ram is not a real historical character, but we believe Ram killed Shambuk for doing ascetics even being a Shudra. Now, If we ask the question what was the Varna of Valmiki, and how did be became a sage? Then we find the story of Shambuka might not be true!
